general.title: General Settings

chatMessage.title: Automatic Chat Messages
chatMessage.description: Automatically send a message to Twitch chat when displaying
chatMessage.posterEnabledDescription: Sends the chat message defined on the poster when displayed
chatMessage.guestEnabledDescription: Sends the chat message defined on the guest when lower third is displayed

obs.title: OBS WebSocket Settings
obs.description: Configure connection to OBS Studio WebSocket server
obs.passwordHelp: Find in OBS: Tools ‚Üí obs-websocket Settings ‚Üí Show Connect Info
obs.setupStep4: Note the Server Port (default: 4455) and Password (if enabled)
obs.setupStep5: Enter the connection details above and test
obs.configPriorityDesc: Settings saved here take priority over .env file. Use "Clear & Use .env" to revert to environment variables.
obs.loadError: Failed to load settings from server. Values shown are defaults and may not reflect your actual configuration.

streamerbot.title: Streamer.bot Connection
streamerbot.description: Configure connection to Streamer.bot WebSocket server for chat integration
streamerbot.passwordPlaceholder: Leave empty if auth is disabled
streamerbot.passwordHelp: Find in Streamer.bot: Servers/Clients ‚Üí WebSocket Server ‚Üí Authentication
streamerbot.setupStep1: Open Streamer.bot and go to Servers/Clients -> WebSocket Server
streamerbot.setupStep2: Enable the WebSocket Server and note the URL (host:port)
streamerbot.setupStep3: If authentication is enabled, copy the password
streamerbot.setupStep4: Enter the connection details above and test the connection
streamerbot.loadError: Failed to load settings from server. Values shown are defaults and may not reflect your actual configuration.

rooms.title: Presenter Rooms
rooms.description: Configure presenter rooms with VDO.Ninja return video and Twitch chat integration
rooms.noRooms: No rooms configured yet. Create your first room to get started.
rooms.vdoNinjaUrlHelp: Optional. Embedded iframe URL for return video feed.
rooms.quickRepliesHelp: Quick reply buttons shown to the presenter for fast responses.
rooms.allowCustomMessagesHelp: When enabled, presenters can type and send custom reply messages.
rooms.allowPresenterChat: Allow Presenter to Send Chat Messages
rooms.allowPresenterChatHelp: When enabled, presenters can send messages to Twitch/YouTube chat via Streamer.bot (requires authentication).
rooms.dialogDescription: Configure the presenter room settings including video return and chat URLs
rooms.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete "{name}"? This action cannot be undone.

presenterChannel.quickRepliesHelp: Quick reply buttons shown to the presenter (max {max}).
presenterChannel.allowCustomMessagesHelp: When enabled, presenters can type and send custom reply messages to control room.
presenterChannel.allowPresenterChat: Allow Presenter to Send Chat Messages
presenterChannel.allowPresenterChatHelp: When enabled, presenters can send messages to Twitch/YouTube chat via Streamer.bot.
